oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Chopped Straw As A Litter In Sheepdrove Organic Farm Organic Silvo-Poultry System
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pegg, Vanessa
Dyke, Kirstie
Pearce, Bruce
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Poultry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A trial was undertaken to determine whether there was an advantage in using an alternative litter in the poultry field sheds, than the usual straw, on the Sheepdrove Organic Farms (SOF) silvo-poultry production system.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Pegg, Vanessa ; Dyke, Kirstie and Pearce, Bruce (2003) Chopped Straw As A Litter In Sheepdrove Organic Farm Organic Silvo-Poultry System. .
